name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore #4 Health to ALL_minions.
flavor: It isn't really a circle.

name: Desperate Prayer
text: Restore #5 Health to each hero.
flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

name: Forbidden Shaping
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Forbidden Words
text: [x]Spend all your Mana.\nDestroy a minion with that\nmuch Attack or less.
flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by\n@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "What's that you're dreaming?\nYou're weak and you're screaming!\nIt must be my scheming..."

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Regenerate
text: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Silence
text: Silence a minion.
flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Topsy Turvy
text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Whispers of EVIL
text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

name: Activate the Obelisk
text: Quest: Restore 15_Health.\nReward: Obelisk's Eye.
flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

name: Awaken the Makers
text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

name: Binding Heal
text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

name: Call of the Grave
text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

name: Chameleos
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

name: Cleric of An'she
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

name: Cleric of Scales
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Cloning Device
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

name: Crimson Clergy
text: After a friendly character is healed, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He won't drop the ball.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 5.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Priest.

name: Crystalline Oracle
text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

name: Disciple of Galakrond
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

name: Draconic Studies
text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your\nnext one costs (1) less.
flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Embalming Ritual
text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

name: Focused Will
text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavor: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 6.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Priest.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nTaunt
flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Light of the Naaru
text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor: I see what you did there.

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

name: Pint-Size Potion
text: [x]Give all enemy minions\n-3 Attack this turn only.
flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

name: Potion of Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

name: Power Word: Glory
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to\nyour hero.
flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2_Health.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Psionic Probe
text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Radiance
text: Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Because you're worth it!

name: Reliquary of Souls
text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your_next turn.
flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Seek Guidance
text: [x]Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

name: Shadowbomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

name: Shard of the Naaru
text: Tradeable\nSilence all enemy minions.
flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

name: Spirit of the Dead
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
flavor: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

name: Test Subject
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
flavor: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

name: Twilight Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Voidtouched Attendant
text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

name: Auchenai Phantasm
text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

name: Condemn (Rank 1)
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

name: Confuse
text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
flavor: This minion is really powerful!

name: Convert
text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

name: Dead Ringer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
flavor: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

name: Divine Hymn
text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.
flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!
howToGet: Unlocked at Level 2.
howToGetGold: Unlocked at Level 28.

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Embrace the Shadow
text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

name: Envoy of Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle\nI said kobold! When you’re short in the candle\nCast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: Grandmummy
text: [x]Reborn\n Deathrattle: Give a random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Holy Ripple
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Mana Geode
text: Whenever this minion is_healed, summon a 2/2_Crystal.
flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

name: Mind Blast
text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.
howToGet: Unlocked at Level 1.
howToGetGold: Unlocked at Level 15.

name: Museum Curator
text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Penance
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to a_minion.
flavor: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

name: Power Word: Feast
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Purify
text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Radiant Elemental
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

name: Renew
text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Resurrect
text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Seance
text: Choose a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: “The spirits spoke to me.”\n"What did they say?"\n"You had lethal two turns ago."

name: Serena Bloodfeather
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

name: Sethekk Veilweaver
text: [x]After you cast a spell on\na minion, add a Priest\nspell to your hand.
flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

name: Shadow Ascendant
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ngive another random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

name: Shadow Visions
text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shadowboxer
text: Whenever a minion is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

name: Shadowcloth Needle
text:
[x]After you cast a Shadow
spell, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a_2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Shrinkmeister
text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2_Attack this turn.
flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

name: Soothsayer's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

name: Spirit Lash
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $1 damage to_all_minions.
flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

name: Squashling
text: [x]Echo\nBattlecry: Restore #2 Health.
flavor: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 7.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Priest.

name: Twilight Deceptor
text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Wyrmrest Agent
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

name: Acolyte of Agony
text: Lifesteal
flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

name: Apotheosis
text: Give a minion +1/+2 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Breath of the Infinite
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Curious Glimmerroot
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

name: Dark Cultist
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Dark Prophecy
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

name: Devouring Plague
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage\nrandomly split among\nall enemy minions.
flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

name: Devout Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Holy spell,\nreduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

name: Dragon Soul
text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Extra Arms
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2.\nAdd 'More Arms!' to your\nhand that gives +2/+2.
flavor: All the better to hug you with!

name: Fairground Fool
text: Taunt\nCorrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavor: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Gilded Gargoyle
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

name: Kabal Talonpriest
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?
howToGet: Unlocked at level 1.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

name: Madame Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\ncopy of a card in your\nopponent's hand.
flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
text: Battlecry: Choose an\nenemy minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Mindrender Illucia
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Mirage Caller
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nreduce the cost of a random\ncard in your hand by (1).
flavor: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Omega Medic
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore #10 Health to your hero.
flavor: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: Palm Reading
text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Actual palms not required.

name: Psyfiend
text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

name: Sand Drudge
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
flavor: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

name: Shadow Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Shadowed Spirit
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 3\ndamage to the\nenemy hero.
flavor: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 3.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

name: Shadowfiend
text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

name: Surrender to Madness
text: [x]Destroy 3 of your Mana\nCrystals. Give all minions\nin your deck +2/+2.
flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Velen's Chosen
text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

name: Vivid Nightmare
text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it with\n1 Health remaining.
flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Auchenai Soulpriest
text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

name: Auspicious Spirits
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
flavor: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's\nHealth changed this turn,\ndestroy a minion.
flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Cabal Acolyte
text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
text: [x]After you play a minion,\ndestroy it and summon a\n4/4 Failed Student.
flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

name: Duskbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

name: Eternal Servitude
text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

name: Fate Weaver
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, reduce the Cost of\ncards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

name: Grave Rune
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Greater Healing Potion
text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: High Priest Amet
text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Holy Champion
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Hooded Acolyte
text: Whenever a character is healed, give your\nC'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

name: Lightsteed
text: Your healing effects also give affected minions\n+2_Health.
flavor: All the steed, half the calories.

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Mindgames
text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Priest of the Feast
text: Whenever you cast a spell, restore #3 Health to\nyour hero.
flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Psychopomp
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Shadow Word: Horror
text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Shifting Shade
text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

name: Spawn of Shadows
text: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavor: Used to be called "             , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Void Flayer
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $4 damage.
flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Xyrella
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Against All Odds
text: Destroy ALL\nodd-Attack minions.
flavor: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

name: Chronobreaker
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt and Corrupted cards in your hand and deck by (2).
flavor: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

name: Darkbishop Benedictus
text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.
howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 United in Stormwind Legendary cards.

name: Darkshire Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

name: Devour Mind
text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

name: Drakonid Operative
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

name: Excavated Evil
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions.\nShuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Fortune Teller
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1/+1 for\neach spell in your hand.
flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Glitter Moth
text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
flavor: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

name: Holy Water
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

name: Kabal Songstealer
text: [x]Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

name: Lyra the Sunshard
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

name: Mass Hysteria
text: Force each minion to_attack another random minion.
flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Onyx Bishop
text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Power Word: Replicate
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Power Word: Tentacles
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

name: Priest of An'she
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

name: Psyche Split
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Quartz Elemental
text: Can't attack while damaged.
flavor: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

name: Raza the Chained
text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has \nno duplicates, your Hero\n Power costs (0) this game.
flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

name: Reckless Experimenter
text: [x]Deathrattle minions you\nplay cost (3) less, but die\nat the end of the turn.
flavor: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion.\nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Twilight Darkmender
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore #10 Health to your hero.
flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

name: Upgraded Repair Bot
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

name: Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

name: Aeon Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to_a minion equal to its_Attack.
flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Coffin Crasher
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
flavor: Also does weddings.

name: Dragonfire Potion
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions except Dragons.
flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

name: Embrace Darkness
text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

name: Entomb
text: Choose an enemy minion.\nShuffle it into your deck.
flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Herald Volazj
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

name: Holy Fire
text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Initiation
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Lady in White
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire'\n_on every minion in your deck_\n(set Attack equal to Health).
flavor: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Lightshower Elemental
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore #8 Health\nto all friendly characters.
flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Shadow Essence
text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Archbishop Benedictus
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost\nminions from your deck\nuntil your hand is full.
flavor: Everyone's dying to meet him.

name: Confessor Paletress
text: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

name: Elekk Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1\nrandom enemy minion.\n(@)
flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

name: Nightscale Matriarch
text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3_Whelp.
flavor: Everywhelp, get in here!

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Psychic Scream
text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Skeletal Dragon
text: [x]Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, add\na Dragon to your hand.
flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Soul Mirror
text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Temporus
text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a friendly minion\nthat died this game.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Free From Amber
text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

name: G'huun the Blood God
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
text: Summon a 10/10 copy_of a minion in your deck.
flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last_turn.
flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

name: Princess Talanji
text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that_didn't start in your_deck.
flavor: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Shadowreaper Anduin
text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

name: Blood of G'huun
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Mass Resurrection
text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Obsidian Statue
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavor: "A BIG mistake."

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Grave Horror
text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
flavor: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.
